sakis ayah are a Taiwanese Aboriginal tribe with 
a population as little as five thousand they are

most culturally linguistically and genetically 
tied to other Austronesian ethnic groups that can

be found in the Philippines Malaysia Madagascar 
and Oceania and these are the Zaki's ire witches
